name: LOGAN vs KSI
description:
LOGAN vs KSI
In this game you'll fight for one of your favorite vloggers.

Both of them are at the top of YouTube. That's why we've decided to give you an opportunity to fight for one of them
in our game. And the judge of this fight will be the most popular youtuber at the moment.

In this game you can choose which vlogger to fight for. The fight lasts 3 rounds and the one who scores more points wins!

Features:
  • A lot of memes
  • Your favorite vloggers
  • Pixel art graphics
